title: Condors: Giant Birds
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,028 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 1020L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and Y
description: Condors: Giant Birds will teach students all about these incredible birds, from their habitats to their near extinction to their fascinating eating habits. Detailed maps and pictures support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
